enWisdom: The ignorant person is one who is ignorant of his own capability
The ignorant person is one who is ignorant about his [own] affair
An ignorant person is one who takes his sincere advisor to be a deceiver

Wisdom: الْجَاهِلُ مَنْ أَطَاعَ هَوَاهُ فِي مَعْصِيَةِ رَبِّهِ
enWisdom: An ignorant person is one who obeys his vain desires in disobedience to his Lord

Wisdom: الْجَاهِلُ مَنْ يَعْتَمِدُ عَلَى أَمَلِهِ وَيُقَصِّرُ فِي عَمَلِهِ
enWisdom: The intelligent one relies on his [hard] work, [while] the ignorant one relies on his aspiration

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْجَاهِلَ مَنْ جَهْلُهُ فِي إِغْوَاءٍ وَمَنْ هَوَاهُ فِي إِغْرَاءٍ فَقَوْلُهُ سَقِيمٌ وَفِعْلُهُ ذَمِيمٌ
enWisdom: Verily the ignorant is one whose ignorance leads astray and whose vain desires entice [towards evil]; so his speech is unhealthy and his action is blameworthy
Indeed the ignorant person is one who is enslaved by [worldly] pursuits
